choose.when: select department_name from department union select work_group_name from work_group union select project_name from project

mapper.select: select p.payment_code, p.payment_date, pd.payment_des_name from payment p, payment_des pd where p.payment_des_code = pd.payment_des_code and SUBSTR(TO_DATE(SUBSTR(p.payment_date,1,6), 'YYYY-MM'),1,5) = #{date,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

choose.when: select ew.employee_code, e.employee_name, p.payment_code from employee_work ew, employee e, payment p, department d, site s, selection_of_payment sp where ew.employee_code = e.employee_code and sp.site_code = d.site_code and d.site_code = s.site_code and d.department_code = ew.department_code and sp.job_class_code = ew.job_class_code and p.payment_code = #{Ppayment_code}
